titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.

action.text: Committee on the Budget ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on the Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Nickles. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on February 12, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on the Budget for the 108th Congress.
